overview:
Mr. Berlin is responsible for coordination of administrative efforts and communication at Rentricity. Additionally, he assists in long- and short-term planning efforts, strategic decision-making, growth management, and operational development and support. He is an advanced strategic thinker, especially in the field of renewable energy, and brings a wealth of managerial, financial, and entrepreneurial skills with him.

Mr. Berlin will graduate from the NYU Stern School of Business in the Spring of 2009 as an MBA with specializations in Finance, Entrepreneurship & Innovation, and Strategy. At Stern, he earned national recognition for his leadership of the Stern Campus Greening Initiative, was named a Stern Scholar and Glucksman Finance Fellowship Invitee, co-founded the Stern Energy Club, and received the Alex S. Auerbach Award for Outstanding Contributions to the School. Prior to Rentricity, Mr. Berlin served as the Executive Director of the Woodlawn Community Development Corporation in Pawtucket, RI. He originally hails from Chicago, and earned his Bachelors degree at Brown University.
